extendedInfo.description: busuu.com, the leading online community for language learning, brings you the perfect app to learn Japanese on the go:â° In the latest release - Discounted offer to activate all courses! â Extensive vocabulary - over 3,000 words and key phrasesâ From beginner to advanced intermediate levels (A1 - B2)â Covering 150 different topics using day-to-day situationsâ Comprehensive audio-visual learning material with photos and recordings by native speakersâ Sections include vocabulary, dialogues and interactive testsâ No internet connection requiredâ Free version includes 20 complete learning units - full content can be purchased inside the app!â Learning progress can be synchronized with your profile on busuu.com, the famous online community for learning languages with over 15,000,000 usersâ Only language learning app in the world which includes direct interaction with native speakersâ Submit your writing exercises and get corrected by native speakers from our communityâ Enjoy the latest learning contentâ Now also supports Japanese and Mandarin as interface languagesâ New Travel CourseWhat our mobile app users say about us in their reviews:"You can learn at your own pace. Very useful!""Easy to learn and easy to understand""It is a super fun tool where you learn and interact with other people""This application is really great to learn. I love the correction by natives, practising with native speakers for free. Super app""This is better than my Rosetta Stone Spanish! It is more fun and it is free as opposed to the 500 plus dollars I paid for RS. I highly recommend this app!!""The application is simply super, languages are taught like a game! Very helpful comments from other users on your exercises. Bought a Premium package without hesitation!"

reviews.title: Price
reviews.comment: This app works fine, with nothing wrong but, you only get 5 lessons and then have to pay an extremely big prise at $18 and people want something that is free not around a fortune.

reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.title: Love this app so far
reviews.comment: I got this app so my husband, kids and i can watch our anime with out subtitles but it had inspired us to take a trip to Japan with our children. We love this app.
reviews.author: Nailah Miller

reviews.title: arigato
reviews.comment: basically an e-book. no gimmicks, hence effective as a learning tool
reviews.author: neil tristan yabut

reviews.title: Be careful
reviews.comment: I\'ve studied Japanese before and this seems like a back assed way of learning. It doesn\'t explain conjugatin so far at all but uses it in the conversations. They don\'t explain formal or informal. Its good for what I want to do but if I was learning the language from the beginning I wouldn\'t use this app. Some things don\'t seem worded right and I hate that it uses vocabulary in the conversations that it hasn\'t gone over. Not enough explanation.
